title: [CLIENT] Cannot Connect to Games - Non-Firewall Related
body: After playing 3 games today, I was unable to connect to a fourth, the client will initially open the loading screen, then crash seconds after. I have disabled all firewalls, and I am submitting this ticket as proof of an issue in the case that I am reported for AFK.

replies.body: Last few games have had this issue for me as well.  I have to shut down the entire thing and resign in just to make it work and in most cases I am 2 minutes late going in making the entire affair just plain unpleasant.  Last game it happened to our team's mid laner (managed to come back a minute before game over) and that forced us to just give up playing the game.

Yeah, this has been happening to me every game after the new patch. I fail to connect to the game, and I end up having to restart everything just to enter the game. I usually get back within the first five minutes, but it really affects the game. My teammates aren't reacting very well, either... :(
Where's the "no, but I'm often in games with people having connection issues" option?
